QuestData.Title: Back Again!
QuestData.Description:
Gorgantus just won't give up!
We've defeated her several times already, but the scavengers salvage the body, fix her up and send her right back in here!
She thinks this time she will defeat us... prove her wrong.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A long-lived construct that has been defeated and rebuilt numerous times.
QuestData.RewardText: You made that look easy. Let's hope she learned his lesson this time.
